test.name: Do a GET request and Verify

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.arg: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: ${header} = {'user-agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36'}

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mysession, url=https://dummy.restapiexample.com/, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://dummy.restapiexample.com/api/v1/employees path_url=/api/v1/employees headers={'user-agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Safari/537.36', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Get Value From Json
kw.doc: Get Value From JSON using JSONPath

kw.name: Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Should Not Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are equal.

kw.name: Convert To String
kw.doc: Converts the given item to a Unicode string.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.
